trans-unit.source: Retrieves the internal handle of a window.

seg-source.mrk: Retrieves the internal handle of a window.

target.mrk: Retrieves the internal handle of a window.

trans-unit.source: Parameters
The title/hWnd/class of the window to get the handle. See Title special definition.

seg-source.mrk: The title/hWnd/class of the window to get the handle.

target.mrk: The title/hWnd/class of the window to get the handle.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The text of the window to get the handle. Default is an empty string. See Text special definition.

seg-source.mrk: The text of the window to get the handle.

target.mrk: The text of the window to get the handle.

trans-unit.source: Return Value
a handle to the window.
sets the @error flag to non-zero if the window is not found.

seg-source.mrk: sets the @error flag to non-zero if the window is not found.

target.mrk: sets the @error flag to non-zero if the window is not found.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
This function allows you to use handles to specify windows rather than "title" and "text".

seg-source.mrk: This function allows you to use handles to specify windows rather than "title" and "text".

target.mrk: This function allows you to use handles to specify windows rather than "title" and "text".

trans-unit.source: Once you have obtained the handle you can access the required window even if its title changes.

seg-source.mrk: Once you have obtained the handle you can access the required window even if its title changes.

target.mrk: Once you have obtained the handle you can access the required window even if its title changes.

trans-unit.source: Related
Example
Run Notepad
notepad.exe
Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

seg-source.mrk: Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

target.mrk: Wait 10 seconds for the Notepad window to appear.

trans-unit.source: [CLASS:Notepad]
Retrieve the handle of the Notepad window using the classname of Notepad.

seg-source.mrk: Retrieve the handle of the Notepad window using the classname of Notepad.

target.mrk: Retrieve the handle of the Notepad window using the classname of Notepad.

trans-unit.source: [CLASS:Notepad]
An error occurred when trying to retrieve the window handle of Notepad.

seg-source.mrk: An error occurred when trying to retrieve the window handle of Notepad.

target.mrk: An error occurred when trying to retrieve the window handle of Notepad.

trans-unit.source: Display the handle of the Notepad window.

seg-source.mrk: Display the handle of the Notepad window.

target.mrk: Display the handle of the Notepad window.

trans-unit.source: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinGetHandle.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinGetHandle.

target.mrk: Close the Notepad window using the handle returned by WinGetHandle.
